post_content: One of the most basic avocado brekkie, baked eggs in avocado are quite easy to make too. Plus, these are quite nutritious! All you need to do is cut avocados in half and scoop them out a bit. Pour in egg whites, yolk, and bake.
sub_category: 30 Scrumptious Avocado Recipes You Must Try
sub_category_description:
Toast them, roast them, or sauté them! From salads to desserts, avocados go into almost everything. Check out these delish avocado recipes you must try.
What we love about avocados is that you can eat them anytime, and with anything. Add them to breakfast, brunch, lunch, snack, dinner, and even dessert and cocktails! You will be surprised to know that you can do more than just guacamole and salads with this wonderful Mexican staple fruit. You can make margaritas, puddings, breads, truffles, smoothies, summer rolls, and even ice cream with avocados. Don’t believe us? Check out these awesome avocado recipes we have curated that you must absolutely try.

post_content: A great way to make use of over-ripe avocados. Just mash the ripe avocados and add in cilantro, Meyer lemon juice, and a bit of lemon zest. Get some toasted bread slices and spread the mixture over them to get a hearty delish breakfast.

post_content: Get creative with the classic avocado toast. Once you’ve mashed the avocados, add in some chopped red onion, cilantro, and grated Parmesan cheese. Spread this mouth-watering mixture all over your toast. Add some more cheese on top, if you like.

post_title: Chile-and-Olive-Oil-Fried Egg with Avocado and Sprouts
post_content: Need something to kickstart your weekend? Make this utterly delish chile-and-olive oil fried egg. Fry the eggs crispy with runny yolk. Fill seasoned sprouts, avocado slices, feta, and the eggs in a toasted tortilla. Drizzle a bit of chili oil with hot sauce.
